title: Typing Champions' voicelines in chat
body:
If you were to type champions' voicelines in chat for fun, would you get banned?  A short list of examples: 

"I don't know what he was. I jus' needed him to shut up."

"I prefer going naked, but okay"

"I've seen your wife, you can do better" 

"I am the shaper of lands. And who are you? A nobody."

"That's where you belong. In the dirt." 

"How proud you are of your abilities. Like an ape who just found a stick." 

"Your magic is so primitive. Just like your sense of style."

replies.body:
The short and long is yes. It is possible for typing certain voicelines. Remember, the game is rated for what Riot controls; online interactions are not rated.

Now to expand on the question, it also depends on what you are quoting and to who.

[Asked something similar you might find useful.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/7KoXFpbk-legitimate-taunting)

Yeah, there are quite a few lines the champions have more leeway with than we do.
just avoid {{champion:28}} quotes and you're probably golden
